content.content: Forum at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’   The MIPs are here! With yesterday’s closing of the submission window for proposals wishing to enter the June Governance Cycle, a sea of new MIPs have been posted to the forum. Five Core Units will be receiving their monthly budgets on Monday following the Office Hours modifier, with just over 390,000 DAI to be distributed to our decentralized teams. The DAI is flowing and the MKR is burning. Between calls on lerp the burner is staying pretty active, with 83.16 MKR tokens burned in the 24 hours before this post.      ICYMI - Announcements   Introducing the Liquidations 2.0 portal! Users can now bid on ongoing collateral auctions with flash loans, largely eliminating large liquidity requirements for participation. There’s an open call to help SES identify MakerDAO risks and opportunities.    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Who Does Routine Due Diligence? - @PaperImperium asks about DAO standards on DD for funding applications and more broadly who should be in charge of this important task. [FFT1-DROP] Collateral Onboarding Risk Evaluation - @Philinje and the Real-World Finance Team bring an evaluation on a potential RWA opportunity to the community. Introducing the Real World Asset Company (“RWA Co.”) - @g_dip follows up on the blog post announcement for RWA Co., a business designed to “bridge the gap between the legacy credit markets and MakerDAO.”   Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] - Increase the DSR - @mrabino1 asks for the community’s thoughts on raising the Dai Savings Rate. Multiple questions to leave your input on as well as a healthy thread of discussion.   Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!   Help Wanted  ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Forum at a Glance! The one-stop-shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three-Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Call it a stress test? Liquidations occurred with over 40M DAI worth of collateral sold at Maker on May 19th, 2021. Liquidations 2.0 showed serious strength   Due to this wave of liquidation penalty revenue over 1,100 MKR were burned in the 24 hours before this post   DAI is circulation has dropped to 4.4B as a further result  859×146 26.7 KB      ICYMI - Announcements   Speaker Series #1: St. Louis Fed Senior VP - @PaperImperium hits the ground running, securing a BIG name for the first iteration of the new Speaker Series kicking off on June 29, 2021, at 15:00 UTC with David Andolfatto. The Maker Risk Dashboard came in handy yesterday, check out the forum post for full details and a road-map on forthcoming features.    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Pre-MIP Discussion: A Market Sentiment-Based Strategy to Burn MKR  - @aburban90 brings an idea for dynamic burning of MKR tokens based on market short-interest for the token. [Informal Poll] Does MakerDAO want a mascot? - Following last week’s G&R call @JerryAG from the Content Production Core Unit asks the community who or what they might like as a mascot for MakerDAO. [Discussion] MakerDAO subsidies to political parties - @iammeeoh brings a discussion on paying political parties to function within the DAO for discussion and advocacy.   Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Reduce the USDC PSM tout to 0 -New! - @Aaron_Bartsch signals community sentiment toward reducing the tout parameter for the USDC PSM to 0, effectively allowing no fee, no slippage trades for users seeking to swap their DAI for USDC. [Signal Request] New vault-type for YFI with a higher LR - New! @ultraschuppi signals the community on a Growth partnership with Yearn that would allow for an "ETH-C-like vault for YFI, with a higher Liquidation Ratio but lower Stability Fee.   Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!   Help Wanted  ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available.
